location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Assistant Surgeon, Bushire, to William Simson, Persian Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: This letter concerns the pension of former Company employee, the late Jaffir Ali Khan of Musulipatam [Machilipatnam]. James Pringle Riach, Assistant Surgeon, Bushire, states that the bearer of this letter, Yoosoof Beg, has been entrusted with letters from Shiraz which are addressed to the Governments of Madras and Bombay. The letters, written by Mahomed Ali Khan, son of Jaffir Ali Khan, enquire as to why the latter's pension was stopped.
